content.question: The point of view of the first two paragraphs of the excerpt can best be used to support which of the following historical arguments?

choices.label: Some political leaders pointed to traditions of self-determination when making foreign policy.
Many political leaders argued that the United Statesâ€™ history of expansion justified acquiring colonies.
Democratic politicians advocated using military force to suppress a nationalist movement in the Philippines.
Republican politicians claimed that governing the Philippines would promote domestic economic development.

content.answer: Some political leaders pointed to traditions of self-determination when making foreign policy.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
